characters.name: Albedo
characters.quote: What a view... How about a quick break so I can sketch this beautiful scenery?

characters.name: Alhaitham
characters.quote: I hope my roommate won't be hammering away on another one of his projects in the dead of night... (...)

characters.name: Aloy
characters.quote: I grew up an outcast, and it wasn't much fun. Even though I'm a stranger here, people are friendlier than the tribe that was supposed to raise me (...)

characters.name: Amber
characters.quote: Look, there's a pigeon over there! *giggle* I wish I could fly alongside them.

characters.name: Arataki Itto
characters.quote: Pff, real men don't carry umbrellas... Oh boy, wow, it's really starting to pick up. Uh quick, c'mon, get yours out! C'mon, quick, quick, quick!

characters.name: Baizhu
characters.quote: You mustn't sit for extended periods of time after eating lunch. Instead, I recommend going for a walk, it's good for digestion.

characters.name: Barbara
characters.quote: This weather is so amazing! I could burst into song.

characters.name: Beidou
characters.quote: It's hard to remain on dry land for so long. Can never seem to quite get my land legs back.

characters.name: Bennett
characters.quote: Careful! In this kind of wind, it's easy to get hit in the head by flying rocks.

characters.name: Candace
characters.quote: I will always seek to protect the things that are most important, no matter what it takes... even when it looks futile.

characters.name: Charlotte
characters.quote: Drat! Missed it again. I never quite manage to get a shot of the lightning strike...

characters.name: Chevreuse
characters.quote: What nice weather! Especially good for keeping an eye on things.

characters.name: Chongyun
characters.quote: "Heart be pure, evil be erased. Mind be purged, world be..." Um... Ugh, I always forget that last part.

characters.name: Collei
characters.quote: It's quite normal to be out until midday on the longer patrol routes. I brought a few extra Pita Pockets — would you like one?

characters.name: Cyno
characters.quote: I do try to lighten the mood sometimes, but... I'm not the best judge of other people's sense of humor.

characters.name: Dehya
characters.quote: We mercs have one simple rule: Whoever pays the most is your new boss.

characters.name: Diluc
characters.quote: The legend of the "Darknight Hero"? An interesting rumor.

characters.name: Diona
characters.quote: Morning~ Can you hand me that can of salted loach from the cabinet? Time to destroy the wine industry!

characters.name: Dori
characters.quote: With enough Mora, you can afford to do anything — even take on the Akademiya.

characters.name: Eula
characters.quote: You want to learn some Favonius Bladework? Heh, alright then, I'll teach you.... Oh yes, I'll teach you, alright, mark my words...

characters.name: Faruzan
characters.quote: Academic research isn't some kind of fad. Topics don't just go in and out of fashion.

characters.name: Fischl
characters.quote: Oh, the sun's out— Oh, um... This meteorological transformation is most splendid! Like a felicitous twist of fate in the face of certain doom.

characters.name: Freminet
characters.quote: I want to spend some time at the bottom of the sea... In peace and total silence.

characters.name: Furina
characters.quote: *sigh* Being too popular can be such a hassle. Who knew the people would adore me so much?

characters.name: Gaming
characters.quote: Boom-boom tsh, and eyes! And boom-boom tsh, and mouth! And... hmm... I need to tighten up that part.

characters.name: Ganyu
characters.quote: Oh, the sun's out. When did that happen?

characters.name: Gorou
characters.quote: A strong body shows strength and instills confidence in others around you. I must always stay at the top of my game!

characters.name: Hu Tao
characters.quote: When the sun's out, bathe in sunlight. But when the moon's out, bathe in moonlight~

characters.name: Jean
characters.quote: It seems I'm immune to coffee now. Perhaps I need to ask Lisa for something... a little stronger...

characters.name: Kaedehara Kazuha
characters.quote: This scenery is wonderful... Surely enough to convince anyone to become a wanderer.

characters.name: Kaeya
characters.quote: Lonely? Me? Not with someone here nagging me all the time, that's for sure.

characters.name: Kamisato Ayaka
characters.quote: I have great affection for the arts: music, song, poetry, shougi, and dancing. And you?

characters.name: Kamisato Ayato
characters.quote: Let's take shelter for the time being. Don't worry, one of my people will be here with umbrellas momentarily.

characters.name: Kaveh
characters.quote: Did you sleep well? I hope you have a great day today. And that you don't run into someone who ruins your day first thing in the morning.

characters.name: Keqing
characters.quote: In adventuring, as in business, you always have to seize the opportunity while it's there.

characters.name: Kirara
characters.quote: Meeoww! Phew... I almost forgot how to speak like a human...

characters.name: Klee
characters.quote: Do you wanna come fish blasting with me? I'll get grounded for a whole day, but it's way worth it coz the fish taste sooo goood!

characters.name: Kujou Sara
characters.quote: Listen. Thunder speaks the will of the Almighty Shogun.

characters.name: Kuki Shinobu
characters.quote: Some commissions are better done by night. I can't trust the gang with such tasks though, so I usually do them myself.

characters.name: Layla
characters.quote: Did you get enough sleep? If you're still tired, you should go back to sleep for a bit... Me? *sigh* I'm... used to it...

characters.name: Lisa
characters.quote: Oh aren't you just the sweetest? Thanks, cutie, you just made my day.

characters.name: Lynette
characters.quote: Entering Standby Mode... I hope nobody disturbs me.

characters.name: Lyney
characters.quote: There's no way we'll be able to see the stars tonight in this weather. Unless... I try making the stars appear anyway!

characters.name: Mika
characters.quote: Verifying our current position, measuring distance to target area... Alright, I've recorded the terrain conditions.

characters.name: Mona
characters.quote: Fate is called as such, for it cannot be changed, nor can it be reversed. It can only but be accepted.

characters.name: Nahida
characters.quote: Quick, let's find shelter, or mushrooms will start growing on our heads.

characters.name: Navia
characters.quote: Sunglasses are great at keeping the sand out of your eyes so you can see your way! Except at night... then you can't see anything at all...

characters.name: Neuvillette
characters.quote: Ah, my apologies. This heavy rain must be quite an inconvenience for you.

characters.name: Nilou
characters.quote: First get into position like this, then move like that... Yep, that's it.

characters.name: Ningguang
characters.quote: We should look for a new investment. Mora doesn't grow on trees.

characters.name: Noelle
characters.quote: You seem tired. Would you like some tea? I'll brew you some. Do you take sugar? One cube, or two?

characters.name: Qiqi
characters.quote: Hey, do you know what? Uhh... neither do I. I... already forgot.

characters.name: Raiden Shogun
characters.quote: All the world holds dear is but a backdrop of constant motion. I stand before it alone and unchanging.

characters.name: Razor
characters.quote: I had a big lunch. Lots of meat. Mm, I'm happy.

characters.name: Rosaria
characters.quote: Blessings from the Anemo Archon Barsibato? Wait... no, it's Bartobas...?

characters.name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
characters.quote: Respect must be given to the will of every creature. Each fish in the ocean swims in its own direction.

characters.name: Sayu
characters.quote: Surely I should be due a growth spurt by now?

characters.name: Shenhe
characters.quote: The assumption that every person has somewhere to call home is naive. I got used to living in the mountains alongside the birds and beasts a long time ago.

characters.name: Shikanoin Heizou
characters.quote: Huh, my intuition tells me that something very interesting is about to happen...

characters.name: Sucrose
characters.quote: Humidity levels are increasing. Think we could run some tests?

characters.name: Tartaglia
characters.quote: This place is pretty dead... By which I mean, there's nothing to kill.

characters.name: Thoma
characters.quote: I really did spend a lot recently, only 10 Mora left... Still, 10 Mora's better than no Mora!

characters.name: Tighnari
characters.quote: If you press a leaf between dry sheets of paper, you can make an attractive and handy bookmark.

characters.name: Aether (Traveler)
characters.quote: Wind blade!

characters.name: Lumine (Traveler)
characters.quote: This world is full of unsolved mysteries...

characters.name: Venti
characters.quote: Hmm? You want to know about my Vision? Oh, go on then, take a look for yourself. I can make you a matching one if you like! Hehehe.

characters.name: Wanderer
characters.quote: You think I've got a sharp tongue? I just tell it like it is. If someone can't handle it, maybe that's their problem.

characters.name: Wriothesley
characters.quote: Word of advice: Don't break the law. Hmm, is there anything else? Oh, yeah... Seriously, don't break the law.

characters.name: Xiangling
characters.quote: You've seen the dragon in Mondstadt? How big was it? What!? No way! Imagine how big a steak a dragon that huge would make!

characters.name: Xianyun
characters.quote: If you are presently unoccupied, perhaps we could stop awhile at one's abode for some repose and conversation?

characters.name: Xiao
characters.quote: Grrgh... Those memories... So dark...

characters.name: Xingqiu
characters.quote: I never embark on a journey without a good book to accompany me.

characters.name: Xinyan
characters.quote: I just came up with an awesome new riff, wanna hear it?

characters.name: Yae Miko
characters.quote: Peace and tranquility seems to be all the rage nowadays, but it gets dreadfully boring after a while...

characters.name: Yanfei
characters.quote: Sometimes the law is compatible with human nature, but sometimes the two conflict. Balancing the two is a discipline in its own right...

characters.name: Yaoyao
characters.quote: Why do so many people make such a big deal out of "seeking the adepti"? There's adepti everywhere! Isn't there?

characters.name: Yelan
characters.quote: It's raining again? Oh, this isn't good... If the rain washes away the traces, it's gonna set us back a long way...

characters.name: Yoimiya
characters.quote: Fireworks are for now, but friends are forever.

characters.name: Yun Jin
characters.quote: My waistband has been feeling a little snug these last couple of days... Methinks I perchance have overindulged...

characters.name: Zhongli
characters.quote: Osmanthus wine tastes the same as I remember... But where are those who share the memory?
